description.p: xmlmantohtml is a small script to convert xml/man to html.
You will find the dtd in /usr/share/xmltoman/ on a debian system. There is also an xsl file to generate html using . See also /usr/share/doc/xmltoman/examples for examples.
If xsltproc proves to be a useful alternative, this program will be obsoleted.

section.name: Author
section.p: xmltoman was written by Oliver Kurth <oku@masqmail.cx>

section.name: Comments
section.p: This man page was written using by the same author.
